text: þa <wundredon> <betwyox> him <cwædon> hwæt <is> <niwe> <lar> þæt he on anwalde <unclænum> castum bebyt, & hi hyrsumiaþ him.
& sona ferde his hlisa to galilea rice.
Hrædlice of hyora gesamnunge hi <coman> on simones & <andreas> hus mid iacobe & <iohanne>.
Soþlice þa sæt simones sweger <hriþigende> & hi him be hire sædan.
& genealæcende <he> hi up ahof hire handa gegripenre, & hrædlice.
<bodiende> on <hyora> & ealle galilea & dyofel syocnessa <ut> adrifende.
& to him com sum hryofla hine biddende & bygedum cnyowum him to cwæþ: Drihten, gif þu wilt þu miht geclænsian me.
<Soþlice> se hælend him <gemiltsade> & his hand <aþenode> <&> hine æthrinende þus cwæþ: Ic wille byo þu geclænsad.
& þa he þus cwæþ sona syo <hreofnes> him fram gewat, & he wæs geclænsad.
